text: eheth dhathusena rajutath, kalawawatath pawathi abhiyoga handunagath galkulada awasanaye paludu wi giyeya.

methana dena behethwalatath wada nopenena shakthiyakin thamayi leda suwa wenne.

athdekata hondatama dadiya dala…
ee anuwayi me samuluwa aarambha karanna thiranayak ganne.

dedenatama tharuka handa athi bawa pahadili wiya.
mama kiwwe ara podiun sellam karana thuwakku gana..
mohothak awasi wiya.
diyunu ratawala prathipaththi wardhanaya we
budunwahansege parinirwanaya ema dharma sakachchawe mathrukawa wiya.

“jathika aarakshawa hondinma artha dakwiya hakke ratakata, thama janathawata owunge wishwasayanta ha balaporoththu anuwa, swadhinawa saha karadarayakin thorawa jiwathwimata awasi deshiya saha wideshiya thathwayan palanaya kirimata athi hakiyawa weyi.“
namuth mata oonama charithayak kala hakiyi.

eeta amatharawa monaragala sel pilima wahanse nirmanaya wu aakaraya pilibadawa sakaskala wartha wadasatahanak dawantha rupawahini thirayak osse narambaimata menma bodhi puja gatha athulath poth pinchak labaganima sadahada etisalat lanka samagama wisin bathimathun wetha ehidi awasthawa laba di thibe.
eyalata sthuthi karala aapahu awith wasala malli kiwwe mehema kathawak.
gayu sama giyakinma janapriyathwayata pathwu chandrasena hettiaarachchi pasugiyada derana star siti wadasatahanakadi apuru githayak gayana kara thibuna.
minissu hamaෙdtama randu wenawa.
thalduwa ha dehioowita wani pradhana marga depasa athi nagarawala adata dashaka gananawakata pera idi kala mewani godanagili ada pawa bhawitha we.
malayata mala panala….
maradane nowana nisa mama post eke damme naththe.
un ese gawasenne aahara sandahama nowe.
mal pipi natanne para wime aadhipathyayata nathuwa noweda?
napure palanu piyawara namuth romayedi pawa, lokaye bhayanaka ha lajja sahagatha de athi sthanaya owunge madhyasthanaya soya gena prasiddha wiya.

pisa gath bath kap 2 chop karagath lunu gediyak kudawata kapa gath katu rahitha chikan kap 1 ½ ho kamathi mas wargayak kapagath karat, liks kap 1\2 kon ata mesa handi 3k kechap mesa handi 2 kiri mesa handak chis mesa handi 3k thel saha batar batar tikak thel swalpayak ekka rath wenna thiyala eekata chikan tika dala badenna arinna.
eya nisagayen merata athi wuwak no weyi.
ohugeyi mageyi manasa ekata wadakaranne.
ehema nam dan rajya depala apaharanayata saha sorakam kirimata mangala samarawira amathithuma athadanguwata gatha yuthuyi.
thasawawa paniya jalaya labaganimata wenkara athi nisa ehi diya namata awasara natha.
athula diha balagena mohothak hitapu sujatha aayeth ge athulata giye mumunamin.

samiyath, thamath dedenama aasadithayan bawata pathwimen pasuwath ee bawa samajayata rahasakwa thibune nam thaman metharam pidawakata lak nowana bawa pawasana prinsi mangalika thamanta prathikara kala rohale heda karya mandalaya ee pilibanda rahasyabhawaya aaraksha kirime wagakima ullanghanaya kirima hethuwen siya jiwithaya 'kabalen lipata watuna' bawa sandahan kalaya.
ee langata honda ma saha sudusuma madhya anguru.
rajawaliya - pitapath pilibanda wisthara
sama naha kiyala..
sahenna digayi ban ayiye..

mama, hasiya, nina, mera, thara, mita amatharawa indala hitala ena ewwo une bopaya, abilin, jusa, nariya, lasa, anjanaya.
mata kawi liyanna ba appa..puluwan hatiye uththarayak dunne hodada mi godayo..

pasugiya sathiyedi mahinda thamange kalaye siti aarakshaka ansha pradhanin kihipadenek kandawa thibune dina kihipayakata kalin danum dun paridi rate aarakshawa sambandhayen wana warthawa labaganimataya.
thama ratedi oostreliya pahasuwen parajaya kala dakunu aprikawa dan pasuwanne ema pannaraye unusuma samagaya.
ko ban thama umbae heta aawe nadda?
ohu ema awasthawe bimathin sita athi bawatayi polisiya saka pala karanne.
uuwa palath hitapu manthri thissa kutitiaarachchi rakshitha bandhanaga...
api denna koyi tharam yaluwunada kiyanawanam tikakin keli patikka mage ukule.
ee nirukthiya kese wethath, apage nila rajawanshaye nam desa balamu.

kalawen lada janapriyathwaya wadath paladayi saha sadharana lesa janathawa udesa yodaganimin sarthaka deshapalanayak kala haki bawa pennum kala, merata bihiwu ekama saha awasana deshapalagnyaya wanneda wijaya kumarathunga bawa podu piliganimayi. 1988 pebarawari 16 wana dina awasanawantha lesa ghathanayata lak wu me aadaraniya manawa hithawadiya apata kiya dun padam adatath walanguyi.

abhiyoga rasak mada shri lanka pila ada indiyawata erehiwa test tharaga bime | dinamina niwasa abhiyoga rasak mada shri lanka pila ada indiyawata erehiwa test tharaga bime jathyanthara test tharaga bime anka eke kandayama lesa peramune pasuwana prabala indiya pila hamuwe hama athinma binduwata wati sitiyath indiya bhumiye siya palamu test jayagrahanaye sihinaya saba karaganime adhishtanayen shakthimath wu shri lanka kandayama ada (16) kalkata nuwara eedn gadns kridanganayedi depila athara tharaga 3kin samanwitha test tharagamalawe palamu tharagaya aarambha karayi.

me gathiya adhipathiwadi thalayanhi sitina ayata, nathinam jiwitha kalayak pura adhipathiwadaya pa්rashna kirimakin thorawa pili gena sitina gathanugathikayanta ha madhya lokkanta norissima apata therum gatha hakiyi.

eelangata thaththa rata wate iskola wal ugannana kale siddha wechcha rasawath siduwim, amma rassawata giyapu mul kale wechcha kes wage rasawath siddhi witharak neweyi 89 kalabala kale eka eka siddhith apita kiyala dunne me welawedi thamayi.
oya mata thagith genalla
meka gayanaya, narthanaya dekama ekathu wunu prasangayak nisa wiwidhathwayak thiyenawa.
idam hektayara 810ka waga katayuthu sidu kirimatath, yala, maha yana kanna deka yatathe wi waga kirima me yatathe sidukere.
anthimedi me yana kramayata kawuru akamathi unath mahinda dinanawama thamayi.
aayathanayak washayen sthapanaya wela balaya ekka gata gahila nothibba nam bauddha puhunuwata pawa me aya wiruddha wenawa.

ema pathwima siduwi dinakihipayak gathawethma, aayathanaye sanrakshitha darshana bahira parshawayanta labadimata adalawa allas komisa wisin parikshana aarambhakara athi athara, ee anuwa (28) wanida ema parikshanayata adalawa rupawahini baladarayan allas komisamata kadawa parikshana aarambhakara atha.

hisakes wala melanin warnakaya nishpadanayawima kalinma nathara wima mita hethu we.welanda pole athi warnaka wala itha wishala lesa rasayanika drawyaya adangu we.me sandaha gedaradima yediya haki piliyam thibe.
"happe hunga kalekin joduwak aawe, inda ganilla, inda ganilla..."
padama paththaka thiyala katha balime aadinawa, tiwi baliman sidu wana ahithakara balapama gena kattiyata
enam godanagillaka siraswa ha parshawikawa athiwana balayan ta prathirodha wana aakaraya ha emagin bida nowatima gana hoda awabodhayak thibiya yuthuyi.
mema galawima laba ganimata kisima aadharakayak upakarayak balaporoththu wiya yuthu nowe.
ayata katha karaganimata apahasu bawa wishmita therum giyaya.wishmi thawa thawath biyapath wiya.age hitha assen aa siyum wedanawak ikmanin hitha pura pathira giyaya.
warak rohale sewa murayen pasuwa rathriyaka mama waidya gnyanadasa mahatha samaga palali rohale niladharin ge nila niwasnayedi lagan hindi chithrapataya narambauwemi.
balaya laba ganimedi ithihasaye monawa kiya athath paksha dekama wiwrutha aarthikaya piligani.
ethakota thamayi rotiya hondata thuni wela kadenne nathuwa lassanata enne.
sidu wu bawath mema sthanaya ada theldeniya - kundasale asala
pramadayata hethuwana karunu ehi dakwa thibenawa.
yahapalana ayath chine giya.
lankawe diwiyo na.
ow, dan mama guruwarayek.

me wana wita oste්raliyawe pawathwena bigbash lig tharagawaliyata sahabhagi wi sitina rashid khan ema tharagawaliyedi supiri daskam dakwamin sitina athara ema tharagawaliye tharaga 06kata sahabhagi wemin me wana wita 11k bida hela athi athara panduwarayakadi lakunu laba dime samanya 6katath aduwen pawathwagena yamata samathwa thibe

owun kiyana kisi deyak mata nasuni mama danune mama awakashaye pawiyana seyaki sanekin us ahasata nagunu ma nidahase pawi giyemi pasukan maha wanauyan kurulu gi nada rasa madinpawa yami nisasale mansoyagana noma dath yamakhini munu munu nadayenwayena saththara rawayenrasa widimi mama aadarenmaga harunu sundara yamak

ee chithrapataya swistarlanthaye fi buk chithrapata ulelatath idiripath kala.
me abhimanayen katha karana anagathaya kapa karanna, wirodhatha puwaru athata gena, pare welemin, thamage anagathaya, pamanak nowa, warthamanayada kapa karayi.
ee diwata hasu nowu ithiri sini ata ekin eka diwen gaththemu.
ebawin sawoma kata arinuye biyeni.
ebawin thama ihala jiwithaya sapura ganu was thama niwes awata me niwasa kunu godawal men dakina mowuhu kangi yana niwasa layisthuwata me niwasada ringawannata pora badithi.

sikurada palli yamata muslim daruwanta niwadu labe owun yanne muslim nowana pasalakata nam owunta in adhyapanaya paduwe owunta sikurada pawath wana amathara panthi walatada yamata nohaka ehi paduwada owuntaya thamanta wena paduwa winda gena owun palli yathi owunta palli yamata anith daruwange igena ganime ayithiya nathi kala yuthu natha iridata amathara panthi pawathwima nawaththu pasu muslim daruwanta irida panthi natha owun thama aagama wenuwen sikurada panthi noyana athara anunge aagamak wenuwen irida panthiyada ahimi kara gani iridata daham pasal yamata awashya baudda ha kristhiyani daruwo thamange aagama wenuwen anith daruwange igenimada nathikarathi ( ee daruwange adahasak nowa meyata hure damana unge ammala thaththalage wadaki ) demala daruwan daksha lesa igena ganna nissa unta wala kapanna gos wasara 30 yuddayak api athikara gaththemu anith daruwange (muslim, demala , daham pasal noyana baudda ha kristhiyani )igenimata wala kapima melesa digatama karagena giyoth ewita athiwena yuddaya nawathwimata (manushika meheyumak !!!

widuli bala mandalayata ha paudgalika widulibala nishpadakayanta ihala sahanadhara milak yatathe dawithel sapayima, rupiyala awapramanaya wima saha borathel genwana rata wenas kirimata siduwima yanadi karunu thel sansthawe paduwata pradhana washayenma hethu wi thibe.

warthamana maha banku adhipathiwarayata nodanwa loka bankuwe niladhariyaku saha sakshikaru athara siduwi thibena rajakari mattame eemel paniwuda huwamaruwak pilibandawa nithignya chanaka da silwa mahatha bandumkara komisama hamuwe eeye (17) anawaranaya kaleya.

dannawa yayi bakapandithakamata sitha sitiya ta ape wadihiti samajaya me gana danna itigediyak nathi bawa sidu wemin thiyena dewalin udin ma helidaraw weyi.
kumarayata thamayi uu nadaththu karana wade pawarila thibune.
idikirim sadaha awashya boho drawya prawahanaya karathibune migamuwe hamiltan ala magin rata abhyantharaye sitaya.
kohoma namuth eda aya waya thula nokala yuthu deyak karala thibuna.

demala ammalage wagema sinhala ammalage, ranawiruwange daruwanuth methana innawa.
